text: Engelbert Kraus (30 July 1934 – 14 May 2016) was a German football player. He played for the West Germany national team. Kraus played in one match at the 1962 FIFA World Cup. ==Club career statistics== |- |1952-53||rowspan="11"|Kickers Offenbach||rowspan="11"|Oberliga||10||5 |- |1953-54||19||8 |- |1954-55||30||7 |- |1955-56||25||7 |- |1956-57||26||15 |- |1957-58||28||5 |- |1958-59||23||16 |- |1959-60||27||9 |- |1960-61||30||7 |- |1961-62||28||11 |- |1962-63||29||11 |- |1963-64||rowspan="2"|1860 München||rowspan="2"|Bundesliga||17||8 |- |1964-65||5||1 |- |1965-66||rowspan="2"|Kickers Offenbach||rowspan="2"|Regionalliga||30||6 |- |1966-67||3||0 330||116 330||116 |} ==International career statistics== |- |1955||2||0 |- |1956||0||0 |- |1957||2||1 |- |1958||1||0 |- |1959||0||0 |- |1960||0||0 |- |1961||0||0 |- |1962||3||1 |- |1963||0||0 |- |1964||1||1 |- !Total||9||3 |} ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2016 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Sportspeople from Hesse
